# Annual Dengue Cases from 2005 to 2020

```{r}
library(denguedatahub)
china_annual_data
```

## Visualize `china_annual_data`

```{r}
visdat::vis_dat(china_annual_data)
```

# Applications

```{r, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(magrittr)
library(plotly)

data <- china_annual_data %>% pivot_longer(cols=2:5, names_to = c("type"), values_to = c("count"))
data                                           
p1 <- ggplot(data, aes(x=year, y=count, group=type)) +
  geom_line(aes(col=type)) + geom_point(aes(col=type)) + scale_fill_brewer(palette = "Dark2") +  theme(legend.position = "bottom") 
plotly::ggplotly(p1) %>%
  layout(legend = list(
      orientation = "h"
    )
  )
```
